limitOrdersFastEditingLabel: Display buttons for quick editing of limit orders
denominationSettingsHint: The values below define a set of buttons for quickly changing the price in limit orders. Each denomination is a multiplier for the standard price step of the selected instrument. I.e. at par value 2 and price step 0.1, the price of a limit order will be changed to
volumeSettingsHint: The values below define a set of buttons for quickly changing the volume (number of lots) in a limit order.
